Injured on 5/5/1989 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1991, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Traded from New York (N) to Detroit on 6/9/1991 (Going to NYM: P J. Reardon, C G. Williams, P F. Rodriguez. Going to DET: LF M. Young, P R. Anderson)...

Won World Series with Detroit in 1992...
